class_notes: Asynchronous assessments, Technology required: webcam, microphone, ability to scan written work.
course_description: This course discusses the development of economic doctrine and analysis from before capitalism to the modern period. Reading and discussion of historical texts are used to inform current economic debates.
prerequisites: (ECON_OX 101 or ECON 101) and (ECON_OX 112 or ECON 112) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4356, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: C. Blake, Status: Open
